DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , open label , single-dose , 6-sequence , 3-period , crossover study evaluate pharmacokinetic drug interaction eperisone hydrochloride aceclofenac healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetic Drug Interaction Between Eperisone Hydrochloride Aceclofenac Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: BMI : 20.0 28.0 kg/m2 willingness sign write informed consent form ( ICF ) Evidence clinically relevant pathology within 30 day prior drug administration History relevant drug and/or food allergy
